ASE Boose Luke Moss c3623723/ASE_Project.keywords: Class AppCanvas Namespace ASE_Project Assembly ASE Project.dll public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Derived AESUnitTest Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas() The constructor for the AppCanvas class. public AppCanvas() Fields g public Graphics g Field Value Graphics Properties PenColour Creates the PenColour object. The object is public to be used elsewhere in the code. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos the constructor for the X Position. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos The constructor for the Y position. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Function for circle size. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int radius size of the circle. filled bool sets the circle to not be filled with colour when draw onto the canvas. Exceptions CanvasException if the circle radius is less than 0 an error message is displayed. Clear() Clears the canvas, set's the colour back to default (gray). public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) DrawTo function, draws a straight line from the X and Y position. public void DrawTo(int toX, int toY) Parameters toX int X position for the straight line. toY int Y position for the straight line. Exceptions CanvasException Error message if the X or Y position are below zero. MoveTo(int, int) MoveTo function, used to move the cursor across the canvas. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int X position for the cursor. y int Y position for the cursor. Exceptions CanvasException Rect(int, int, bool) Rectangle function, used to draw a rectangle on the canvas. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int The width of the rectangle. height int The height of the rectangle. filled bool By default the rectangle is not filled. Reset() Reset's the X and Y position to 0. public void Reset() Set(int, int) Used to set the size of the canvas. public void Set(int xsize, int ysize) Parameters xsize int The horizontal size of the canvas. ysize int The vertical size of the canvas. SetColour(int, int, int) The set colour function, used to change the colour of the pen. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int The numerical amount of red in the colour. green int The numerical amount of green in the colour. blue int The numerical amount of blue in the colour. Exceptions CanvasException if bigger than 255, an error message is displayed. Tri(int, int) The triangle function used to draw a triangle onto the canvas. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int The height of the triangle. height int The width of the triangle. Exceptions CanvasException if the width or height are below zero, an error message is displayed. WriteText(string) The write text function, used to write text onto the canvas. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string the text input into the multiline box is displayed onto the canvas. getBitmap() Bitmap function, returns the bitmap. public object getBitmap() Returns object
